channel.title: Server.class error for 508 David scape
channel.description:
I get this error when i try and run the server. Server.java and Server.class are in the right places. But nothing still, help?
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DavidScape/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: DavidScape.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: DavidScape/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Server.class error for 508 David scape
